sentences.en: 'I won't do it!'she informed him bluntly.
sentences.cn: “ 我才不干呢! ” 她直截了当地告诉他.

sentences.en: "I don't believe you!" Jeanne said bluntly.
sentences.cn: “我不相信你！”珍妮毫不客气地说。

sentences.en: But can we speak so bluntly in front of the poor man!
sentences.cn: 但我们似乎不要在他面前说实话!

sentences.en: But there was the danger of his breaking through my defense bluntly.
sentences.cn: 可是我的防线仍有被他突然冲破的危险.

sentences.en: I was carefully to state the root fact bluntly.
sentences.cn: 我很慎重地、坦率地介绍了基本事实.

sentences.en: Lord Beaverbrook, to put it bluntly, played hell with the war policy of the R.A.F.
sentences.cn: 直言不讳地说，比弗布鲁克勋爵将皇家空军的作战方针搞得一团糟。

sentences.en: She told me bluntly it was my own fault.
sentences.cn: 她坦率地说那是我个人的错.

sentences.en: The chancellor bluntly warned the Cabinet to axe public spending or face higher taxes.
sentences.cn: 大臣直接警告内阁要么大幅削减公共开支,要么加税.

sentences.en: The Pope bluntly told the world's priests yesterday to stay celibate.
sentences.cn: 教皇昨天直言全世界的神父都应该禁欲。

sentences.en: To put it bluntly , I want a divorce.
To put it bluntly , she’s not up to the job.
sentences.cn: 恕我直言，她不适合这份工作。

sentences.cn: 说穿了, 无非是想推卸责任.

sentences.en: To put it bluntly, Tianjin produces good - for - nothing loafers and hooligans.
sentences.cn: 说不中听的话, 天津卫出混混、出青皮.

sentences.en: To put it bluntly, you're fired!
sentences.cn: 直截了当地说吧, 你被解雇了!

sentences.en: You talk bluntly about a lot of things in your book.
sentences.cn: 在你的书里坦率地谈了很多事.
